short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download all images from a webpage with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Downloader is the ultimate browser extension for effortlessly extracting images from any webpage. Whether you want to save specific images or download everything at once, this tool makes the process fast and straightforward.
Key Features:
•	Quick Scanning: Detects and lists all images from the current webpage in a grid format.
•	Thumbnail Previews: Displays images with thumbnails, so you know exactly what you’re downloading.
•	Custom Selection: Choose specific images to download using checkboxes.
•	Download All Option: Save all detected images with a single click.
•	Resolution Information: View the dimensions of each image as a tooltip.
•	Lightweight Design: Fast, secure, and efficient without unnecessary bloat.
